section.title: DSSI and LADSPA for Csound
section.para: dssi4cs enables the use of DSSI and LADSPA plugin effects and synthesizers within Csound on Linux. The following opcodes are available:

listitem.para: dssiactivate - Activates or deactivates a plugin if it has this facility
dssilist - Lists all available plugins found in the LADSPA_PATH and DSSI_PATH global variables.
dssiaudio - Process audio using a Plugin.
dssictls - Send control information to a plugin's control port.

section.para: See the entry for dssiinit for a usage example.

note.para: Currently only LADSPA plugins are supported, but DSSI support is planned.
